Class List

Here are the classes, structs, unions and interfaces with brief descriptions:
coverartHolds a coverart-object
mediafileMasterclass for all types of media
playlistalbumThis class handles all album-stuff
playlistdelegateThis is needed to show the Artistname and albumname splitted on two lines
playlisttrackThis class handles all track-contents
playlistwidgetnewThe playlistwidgetnew-class itself This widget organises a playlist, with all functionality needed for a playlist.
It automatically groups all playlisttracks into playlistalbums, and reorganises them on drag and drop.
Also all tracks get actualised automatically, when the files change on disc:
-Regrouping in new albums, if the album changes.
-Update the Coverpicture of playlistalbum.
-Remove of Tracks from the playlist, if file got deleted on disc.
taginformationSimple struct, that can hold tags
taginformation::taginformation::filedatainformationHolds the filespecific values
taginformation::taginformation::v1taginformationHolds the v1tags, if they are existing
taginformation::taginformation::v2taginformationHolds the v2tags, if they are existing
taglibinterfaceThe Interface class to all taglibactions
